EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of three furnaces working in parallel:
- Furnace 1 at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position(2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 3 at position(4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces are processing copper ore into copper plates

### Copper Cable Production Line
Located around position(9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5) producing copper cables
- Input burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5)
- Output burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5)
- Input wooden chest at position(6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates
- Output wooden chest at position(12.5, 11.5) containing mixed materials

### Storage Area
Series of wooden chests:
- Chest at position(14.5, 11.5) storing iron plates (full)
- Chest at position(16.5, 11.5) storing copper plates

### Power Generation System
Located around position(-7.0, 24.5), consists of:
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam transport
- Electric pole network connecting various facilities

### Science Pack Handling System
Located around position(0.5, 30.5), consists of:
- Lab with automation and logistic science pack inputs
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5)
- Storage chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Pipe Connection Issues
- When connecting pipes between boiler and steam engine, ensure there is a clear path without obstructions
- Remove any existing pipes before attempting to place new ones in the same location

### Entity Placement Errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones at a location
- Clear blocked items from ground before placing new entities

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels in boilers and furnaces to prevent fuel depletion
- Ensure sufficient resources in inventory before attempting to insert into machines
- Keep track of copper ore supply to maintain continuous production

### Space Management
- Monitor chest capacities to prevent overflow
- Ensure inserters have clear paths to deposit items
